department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Acquire a 3D Digital Image Correlation (DIC) monitoring and data acquisition system
description: The Royal Military College (RMC) of Canada, Department of Civil Engineering, has a requirement to acquire a high-speed three-dimensional (3D) Digital Image Correlation, non-contact, monitoring and data acquisition and analysis system, as well as compatible low- and high-speed cameras.
tags: no functionalities specified such as high- and low-speed cameras
full_summary:
*Title:*
W0114-220010 3D Digital Image Correlation (DIC) Monitoring and Data Acquisition System

*Government Tender Announcement:*
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Royal Military College of Canada (RMCC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the acquisition of a high-speed three-dimensional (3D) Digital Image Correlation (DIC) monitoring and data acquisition and analysis system.

*Request for Proposal Details:*
 tenderNumber | W0114-220010
 solicitationNumber | WS3692638053
 tenderClosingDate | 2022-11-07T14:00:00
 expectedContractStartDate | 2022-11-01
 expectedContractEndDate | 2023-05-31

*Solicitation Description:*
The RMCC Department of Civil Engineering requires a non-contact monitoring and data acquisition system utilizing 3D DIC technology. Preferred suppliers can bid on this RFP as follows:

* UNSPSC Code:
	+ 43211718: Camera-based vision systems for automated data collection
	+ 45121505: Cinematographic cameras

*Tender Evaluation Criteria:*
The proposed system shall be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Lowest Price

*Trade Agreements:*
This tender is open to all qualified contractors, eligible to participate under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other applicable trade agreements.

*Contact Information:*
Contractor:
 Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) 
 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage 
 Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
 mike.littlefield@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: This tender has expired. Remedial action is required and/or seek separate sources prior to new sourcing.
